LanguageData.Mizu_CleanWater.label: Clearing water
LanguageData.Mizu_CleanWater.description: Allows you to build water purifier.
LanguageData.Mizu_DeepUndergroundWater.label: Deep underground water
LanguageData.Mizu_DeepUndergroundWater.description: Allows you to build pump for drawing underground water of deep layer.
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWater.label: Underground water
LanguageData.Mizu_UndergroundWater.description: Make wells, a primitive building for drawing underground water of shallow layer.
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFacility.label: Water facility
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFacility.description: Allows you to build various facilities that use water.
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFilter.label: Water filter
LanguageData.Mizu_WaterFilter.description: Allows you to build water filters for waterworks.
LanguageData.Mizu_Waterworks.label: Waterworks
LanguageData.Mizu_Waterworks.description: Allows you to build pipe, valve, faucet, tank and some type of pumps.
